metadata.Title: CVE-2012-1093 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The init script in the Debian x11-common package before 1:7.6+12 is vulnerable to a symlink attack that can lead to a privilege escalation during package installation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-1093` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

x11-common - 1:7.7+12ubuntu1
xbase-clients - 1:7.7+12ubuntu1
xorg - 1:7.7+12ubuntu1
xserver-xorg - 1:7.7+12ubuntu1
xserver-xorg-input-all - 1:7.7+12ubuntu1
xserver-xorg-video-all - 1:7.7+12ubuntu1
xutils - 1:7.7+12ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> xorg server is actually the xorg-server package the xorg package only contains docs

criterions.comment: xorg package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:7.7+12ubuntu1').
